definition: to hold/to grasp/to support/to maintain/to persevere/to manage/to run (i.e. administer)/to control
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to be in favor of/to support/to back/support/backing/to stand by/CL:個|个[ge4]
to persevere with/to persist in/to insist on
to take charge of/to manage or direct/to preside over/to uphold/to stand for (justice etc)/to host (a TV or radio program etc)/(TV) anchor
to stay level (of exchange rate, market share etc)/fair/unbiased
to kidnap/to hijack/to abduct/to hold under duress

sentences.english: It is legal to stay in China only after you have the valid Residence Permit.
sentences.chinese: 留学生持居留许可在华居住方属合法。

sentences.english: Australian reports said the other three men were Chinese passport-holders.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亚称其他三名男子持中国护照。

sentences.english: He had ranked himself in the numerous phalanx of unbelievers.
sentences.chinese: 他一直象其它无数怀疑者一样持怀疑态度。

sentences.english: Nolan has reservations about the new diplomas.
sentences.chinese: 诺兰对新的文凭持保留态度。

sentences.english: Candidates can attend the test with he admission ticket issued by the testing site.
sentences.chinese: 考生持主考单位核发的“准考证”进入考场参加考试。

sentences.english: The realm of reproductive technology is unusually laissez-faire in the U.S.
sentences.chinese: 在美国对待辅助生育技术的滥用持放任自流的态度。

sentences.english: New findings may also require a “wait-and-see” attitude.
sentences.chinese: 实验结果有时也许要求人们持“观望态度”。

sentences.english: Take the voucher to your local branch of Woolworths and it will be redeemed for one toy.
sentences.chinese: 持兑换券到当地沃尔沃斯的分店可以兑换一个玩具。

sentences.english: The post-modernists are basically critiques of modern life.
sentences.chinese: 后现代主义者对现代生活基本上持批评态度。

sentences.english: Likewise, visuals can lead to erroneous ideas about the triune God.
sentences.chinese: 同样地，图像会误导人对三一真神持错误观念。

sentences.english: Domestic scholars have generally denied legality of anti circumvention.
sentences.chinese: 国内学者普遍对反规避措施的合法性持否定观点。

sentences.english: Vidal Sassoon Academy Shanghai retains the final discretion.
sentences.chinese: 上海沙宣美发学院持最终解释权。

sentences.english: Left-wing dissidents have been emasculated and marginalised.
sentences.chinese: 左派持不同政见者已经遭到削弱和排挤。

sentences.english: Admission to the exhibition will be by invitation only.
sentences.chinese: 只有持邀请函者才可进入展览会。

sentences.english: PEOPLE are sceptical about HUD, the federal Department of Housing and Urban Development.
sentences.chinese: 人们对美国联邦政府住房与城市发展部持怀疑的态度。
别在所有问题上都持骑墙态度呀。

definition: to have in one's possession and use when required
to hold (expectations, hopes etc)/to maintain (an attitude etc)/to harbor (doubts etc)/to clinch (boxing)
to hold in storage/to retain/to harbor (feelings)/to entertain (sentiments)/(of abstract things) to exist/there is
to approve of/to endorse/(vote) in favor
to approve of/to endorse/(vote) in favor
